items.sentence: I don\'t think that anyone suspected that you weren\'t Tom.
Tom thought Mary was moving to Boston, but he was mistaken.
The waiters bumped into each other and dropped their trays.
Police believe that Tom was somehow involved in the murder.
I couldn\'t see Tom\'s face, but I was sure he was smiling.
It\'s clear Tom doesn\'t want to deal with it at this time.
It\'s possible that Tom doesn\'t know how to unclog a sink.
On a hot day like this, the laundry will be dry in no time.
I couldn\'t understand the announcement that was just made.
I guess I could call Tom and ask him to come over and help.
I thought I told you I didn\'t want you to do that anymore.
Tom asked Mary about the accident that she was involved in.
Tom became bored with teaching and he looked for a new job.
Tom said it wasn\'t as difficult to do that as he expected.
I can\'t believe that Tom is really planning on doing this.
I can\'t help you move the piano because I have a bad back.
I don\'t understand why you hang out with Tom all the time.
Both Tom and Mary were very skinny when they were children.
Department stores are always crowded just before Christmas.
The police were able to link Tom\'s DNA to the crime scene.
Why do you think Tom wasn\'t able to pass his driving test?
Why don\'t we fire everyone and hire a group of new people?
Tom said he didn\'t have enough time to make his own lunch.
Tom shouldn\'t tell Mary anything about his ex-girlfriends.
I want the whole world to know we\'re going to get married.
Tom is still the same weight he was when he was a teenager.
Tom is the kind of guy that a girl could fall in love with.
Tom told me Mary wouldn\'t want to play volleyball with us.
Tom told me that he wouldn\'t be able to be at the meeting.
Go straight until you see the post office, then turn right.
I wish that I could figure out how to convince Tom to stay.
Tom said he would\'ve done that by himself if he could\'ve.
That umbrella looks the same as the one I found on the bus.
The last time I saw Tom he was wearing a blue baseball cap.
Tom called me and said that he needed me to do him a favor.
I can\'t go to the party because I can\'t get a babysitter.
It\'s just a question of how much time it\'s going to take.
Tom needs to talk to someone who\'s able to understand him.
I\'m going over to Tom\'s house now to tell him about that.
I could force you to help Tom, but I don\'t really want to.
I didn\'t know that Tom and Mary were both still in prison.
Tom can swim faster than anyone else in his swimming class.
You should tell Tom that Mary is planning to join the team.
Tom was looking for some people to help him move his piano.
We were disappointed to hear that Tom couldn\'t get a visa.
We\'ll probably never be in Boston at the same time Tom is.
Did I ever tell you about what I did last summer in Boston?
I told Tom that we were going to Australia for a few weeks.
Tom locked himself in his bedroom and turned off the light.
Tom looked after my dog while I was traveling in Australia.
